keyMoments.title: Usopp Defends Crew Alone
keyMoments.description: With Luffy incapacitated by Colors Trap and other members trapped in wax, Usopp must face Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine alone.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's interdependence and Usopp's growth as a fighter.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Crew Members in Mortal Danger
keyMoments.description: Zoro, Nami, and Vivi are nearly completely encased in deadly wax while Luffy is hypnotized and unable to help.
keyMoments.significance: One of the crew's most desperate situations in the East Blue Saga, with multiple members facing simultaneous death.

keyMoments.title: Miss Goldenweek's Tactical Support
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek demonstrates her strategic value to Baroque Works by completely neutralizing the Straw Hats' strongest fighter using Colors Trap.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Baroque Works has diverse combat abilities beyond just Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 3's Plan Continues
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3's Giant Candle Service Set continues to work, nearly killing Zoro, Nami, and Vivi despite Luffy's interference.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the effectiveness of Mr. 3's tactical approach to eliminating enemies.
